title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Updated link in CodeQL documentation to point directly to the built-in queries page instead of the reference index.
Added network requirements for self-hosted runners using automatic dependency submission:
Core URLs for GitHub actions and API access (`github.com`, `api.github.com`, `*.githubusercontent.com`)
summary:
- Updated link in CodeQL documentation to point directly to the built-in queries page instead of the reference index.
- Added network requirements for self-hosted runners using automatic dependency submission:
- Core URLs for GitHub actions and API access (`github.com`, `api.github.com`, `*.githubusercontent.com`)
- Ecosystem-specific URLs:
- Go: `go.dev`, `golang.org`, `proxy.golang.org`
- Java: `repo.maven.apache.org`, `api.adoptium.net`, plus vendor-specific JDK sources
- .NET: `aka.ms`, `builds.dotnet.microsoft.com`, `ci.dot.net`
- Python: `python.org`
generated_title: Update CodeQL link and add network config for self-hosted runners in dependency submission
commits: **5cd7e0a**: Link directly to the list of query suites - Avoids an extra click (#58967) (by Chad Bentz)
**0375f99**: Add network requirements for self-hosted runners with automatic dependency submission (#58851) (by Copilot)
original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Updated link in CodeQL documentation to point directly to the built-in queries page instead of the reference index.
- Added network requirements for self-hosted runners using automatic dependency submission:
  - Core URLs for GitHub actions and API access (`github.com`, `api.github.com`, `*.githubusercontent.com`)
  - Ecosystem-specific URLs:
    - Go: `go.dev`, `golang.org`, `proxy.golang.org`
    - Java: `repo.maven.apache.org`, `api.adoptium.net`, plus vendor-specific JDK sources
    - .NET: `aka.ms`, `builds.dotnet.microsoft.com`, `ci.dot.net`
    - Python: `python.org`

### Title  
Update CodeQL link and add network config for self-hosted runners in dependency submission
